channel.title: Product Launch on FinanClub

item.title: 1058 TOST
item.description: score:1058 Chances: Toast announced the launch of Toast Catering & Events, a new product integrated with the Toast point-of-sale to help restaurants manage large catering orders and event planning. Toast’s customizable banquet event orders (BEO), fulfillment tools, and lead management functionality in Toast Catering & Events could provide growth opportunities for the company.
